LanguageData.CWT.useScrollWheel: Use scroll wheel to change work priorities:
LanguageData.CWT.InclinedTT: Rotates the headers slightly to make take up less space while keeping readability
LanguageData.CWT.VerticalTT: Rotates the headers 90 degrees do take up as little space as possible
LanguageData.CWT.VerticalRotatedTT: Rotates the headers 90 degrees do take up as little space as possible while each letter keeps their original rotation. This works best with letters from fixed-size alphabets like Chinese.
